HEADER.Name: BTUC25: Drilldowns
HEADER.ExtraStyle: body {|13||10| background-color: #f8f9fa;|13||10| /* A common light gray */|13||10| padding: 30px;|13||10| /* Add some padding around the main container */|13||10| margin: 0;|13||10| font-family: Arial, sans-serif;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .main-column-90 {|13||10| /* 90% Width and Centering */|13||10| width: 90%;|13||10| margin-left: auto;|13||10| margin-right: auto;|13||10||13||10| /* White Interior and Padding */|13||10| background-color: white;|13||10| padding: 20px;|13||10||13||10| /* Slight Shadow (Equivalent to Bootstrap's .shadow-sm) */|13||10| box-shadow: 0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075);|13||10||13||10| /* Rounded Corners */|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .stacking-row {|13||10| width: 100%;|13||10| /* Ensure it takes full width of the parent */|13||10| margin-bottom: 15px;|13||10| /* Space between the rows (equivalent to mb-3) */|13||10| box-sizing: border-box;|13||10| /* Include padding and border in element's total width/height */|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content {|13||10| padding: 1rem;|13||10| border: 1px solid #dee2e6;|13||10| background-color: #e9ecef;|13||10| /* Very light gray for contrast */|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content h5,|13||10| .inner-row-content p {|13||10| margin-top: 0;|13||10| margin-bottom: 0.5rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content p:last-child {|13||10| margin-bottom: 0;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .button-primary {|13||10| padding: 8px 16px;|13||10| background-color: #007bff;|13||10| color: white;|13||10| border: none;|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| cursor: pointer;|13||10| text-decoration: none;|13||10| display: inline-block;|13||10| margin: 15px;|13||10| }

COMPONENT_1.Name: main-column-90-START

COMPONENT_2.ExtraHTML:
Drilldown Examples

Drilldowns are broken for datatables (DT) that return JSON data. This DT, component 209369, has a defined drilldown to open a SmartView (SV) in a window. Clicking column data directly opens a blank SV (e.g., it's broken).

HEADER.SQLStatement: DECLARE @dd1 INT = %drilldownID1%, @dd2 INT = %drilldownID2%, @dd3 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldowncaption%|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 = ISNULL(@dd1 , -1)|13||10| , @dd2 = ISNULL(@dd2, -2)|13||10| , @dd3 = ISNULL(@dd3, '')|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 AS [DrillDownID1]|13||10|, @dd2 AS [DrilldownID2]|13||10|, @dd3 AS [Drilldowncaption]
HEADER.Name: TEST
HEADER.Notes: Some notes here New line New line 2

COMPONENT_4.ExtraHTML:
The "Text Line" button opens the drilldown defined in the hidden Text Line component: Text Line

The "Custom Values" button opens the drilldown defined in the DataTable component, but sends custom values encoded in the link: Custom Values

The "JSON value" button sends URLEncoded JSON value to the drilldown defined in the DataTable component: JSON Value

Report Example: Report Example

The "Text Line No Params" button opens the drilldown defined in a hidden Text Line component, but sends custom values encoded in the link: Text Line No Params
COMPONENT_4.Name: Links

COMPONENT_6.Caption: Hidden: Opens TEST SV in new window with hardcoded drilldown
COMPONENT_6.Name: OpenTestSV

HEADER.SQLStatement: DECLARE @dd1 INT = %drilldownID1%, @dd2 INT = %drilldownID2%, @dd3 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldowncaption%|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 = ISNULL(@dd1 , -1)|13||10| , @dd2 = ISNULL(@dd2, -2)|13||10| , @dd3 = ISNULL(@dd3, '')|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 AS [DrillDownID1]|13||10|, @dd2 AS [DrilldownID2]|13||10|, @dd3 AS [Drilldowncaption]
HEADER.Name: TEST
HEADER.Notes: Some notes here New line New line 2
